reviews.review: This is a cinematic achievement. It's a must watch. And must watch in a crowded theatre-where you will hear countless cheers, applause, laughter ... and screams.

Infinity War was a hell of a ride. One can't help but admire the work and time that went into constructing this artful amalgam. Even someone who isn't a comic movie fan and has missed some of the movies, like me, can really enjoy this it might just take a bit for you to be able to keep up with what is going on.

Avengers Infinity War delivers on so many levels. As a fan of Marvel movies, I was nervous that it would not live up to expectations, but I am so pleased to say that not only did it meet my expectations, it exceeded them.
Having so many strong personalities in the Marvel movies, from Tony Stark, to Peter Quill, to Stephen Strange, I was nervous that they wouldnt balance the personalities well and it would just be a big mess. But part of what makes Infinity War so great is the success in balancing these interactions, making it feel like theyd always been together. Every member of the Avengers, along with Guardians get their own time on screen to shine, whether its in a great action sequence, or making the audience laugh with one liners. 
The action takes center stage in the movie, but they have balanced it perfectly with humour. With 3-4 different storylines going on at some points too, it would have been very easy for the film to be confusing but they all follow each other very well and the directors have done a fantastic job with the flow of the movie. 
Spoiler Ahead. Some people will likely complain about aspects of the movie, for example the lack of the Hulk being present in the movie, but this was a perfect addition to the movie since it shows the power of Thanos in his capability of besting the hulk, something the hulk has never experiences and shows fear of fighting again. This is something I am sure will be addressed again, or even if the hulk can be presumed dead, the fight with Thanos is certainly an epic way to go out.
Avengers Infinity War is full of action, humour and sadness, with likely the best MCU Villain ever portrayed, I have never experienced a silent movie theater at the end of a movie before, everyone was simply speechless and at the end of the credits applause showed that it was for the right reasons.  Will definitely will be seeing again in the theater and eagerly awaiting the release of BluRay.
Even though this is “Marvel” this isn’t a kid movie by all means
Still processing the movie. Thanos is definitely a true villain in this movie. This is by far the biggest mvp of the avengers.
completely outstanding, it blew my mind away and always leaves you asking what will happen. my favorite marvel movie yet, can not recommend enough
